name: American Airlines Full Flight | Dallas Ft Worth to Charlotte | Airbus A321 (with ATC)
description:
A full length, full flight video from Dallas Fort Worth to Charlotte with American Airlines, onboard Airbus A321 N557UW operating flight AA1938 on January 11 2017.

**Every moment of the flight included from gate to gate.  ATC for entire flight**

PLEASE SUBSCRIBE FOR WEEKLY FULL FLIGHTS
BECOME AN INFLIGHT VIDEO VIP AT http://patreon.com/inflightvideo

FACEBOOK: facebook.com/inflightvideo
TWITTER: twitter.com/inflightvideo
INSTAGRAM: instagram.com/inflightvideo
PATREON: patreon.com/inflightvideo

Airline:  American Airlines
Flight:  AA1938
Aircraft:  Airbus A321 N557UW
From:  Dallas Ft Worth (DFW)
To:  Charlotte (CLT)
Departure:  05:07
Arrival:  08:03
Flight Time:  1:55
Seat:  12A
Flight Path:  https://goo.gl/KAHeEk

Today's flight begins on stand early in the morning at Dallas' Forth Worth Airport.  We push back from the stand and taxi out to runway 18C, before making a beautiful departure over the bright lights of Dallas.  We make a left turn, climbing to 37,000ft as we head towards the sunrise.

Our route takes us over Arkansas and Tennessee, passing Memphis and Nashville before the sun starts to rise over eastern Tennessee.  From there we head across North Carolina towards Charlotte, descending through some bumpy weather.  We make our approach for runway 18R at Charlotte, touching down smoothly ahead of schedule before taxying in to the terminal. 

Thumbnail: RJJAviation (http://www.airplane-pictures.net/photo/835529/n179uw-american-airlines-airbus-a321/)
